meanings.definition: A person who redecorates a space.
meanings.sent1: The redecorator painted the walls a bright color.
meanings.sent2: My mom hired a redecorator to update our living room.
meanings.sent3: The redecorator accidentally spilled paint on the carpet, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: The redecorator's creativity transformed the dull room into a vibrant space.
meanings.sent5: The redecorator carefully selected new furniture to enhance the room's beauty.

meanings.sent1: I plan to redecorate my bedroom with new curtains and bedding.
meanings.sent2: She decided to redecorate the office to make it more inviting.
meanings.sent3: After watching a home makeover show, he felt inspired to redecorate his apartment.
meanings.sent4: The changing seasons motivated her to redecorate her porch with festive decorations.
meanings.sent5: They hired a professional to redecorate their restaurant for a fresh look.
